text: (dutare,) i riti, navu divyavaniya mulaka nim'medege kaluhisiddannu nivu avarige odi kelisabekendu navu nim'mannu ondu samudayadedege kalisiruvevu. Avariginta hinde halavu samudayagalu gatisive. Avarantu a parama dayaluvanne dhikkarisuttiddare. Heliri; avane nanna odeyanu. Avanallade bere devarilla. Nanu avanalle bharavase ittiruvenu. Konege avanedege (ellaru) maralabekagide
